thread.title: Miami coach discusses matchup against Buffalo

title: Miami coach discusses matchup against Buffalo
text:
Miami coach discusses matchup against Buffalo 
Updated: Mon, Oct 26 2015, 01:50 PM 
OXFORD, Ohio (WKRC) -- Miami football coach Chuck Martin discusses the loss at Western Michigan and previews the game against Buffalo in the video. The teams will meet Thursday night at 7:30 p.m. in Oxford. Miami has dropped seven straight games. Image and video courtesy Miami University Athletics Related Stories Business News 
Economists see modest Q4 growth, fewer firms giving raises 
NEW YORK (AP) -- A new survey finds a decline in the number of economists who are bullish on growth for the rest of the year. 
IN THE NEWS: ESPN PULLING CLIPS FROM YOUTUBE 
LOS ANGELES (AP) -- ESPN says it won't play ball with YouTube. Stay Connected:
